description: [QUIETEXIT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1084) has attempted to change its name to `cron` upon startup. During incident response, [QUIETEXIT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1084) samples have been identified that were renamed to blend in with other legitimate files.(Citation: Mandiant APT29 Eye Spy Email Nov 22)

external_references.description: Mandiant. (2022, May 2). UNC3524: Eye Spy on Your Email. Retrieved August 17, 2023.
external_references.source_name: Mandiant APT29 Eye Spy Email Nov 22
